name: Purrfectly Productive
description:
Purrfectly Productive: The Cat's Meow of Labor!
Made for Playsar FEST I

Don't lose control! You have to make 30 kittens from the Generator to win this life!
But bad luck, the generator is constantly breaking down! If it is broken, then kittens are not made... If the generator breaks down completely, then you will lose
